input: World Sake Day or "Nihonshu no Hi" is a significant day on the Japanese calendar with celebrations held annually on 1 October. This date is considered "New Year's Day" for sake because it marks the first day of the sake
continuation: - making season . Although the beginnings of the festival are murky , one major element that can be attributed to Nihonshu no Hi is the appreciation of the alleged advantages of a small amount of alcohol , particularly sake , to one ' s health .The holiday evolved at a time when Western ideas about Japan ' s drank traditions began to enter the mainstream of Japanese thinking . The only thing that calms him down is speaking his mind , even if he cant be sure that what hes saying is his opinion .The man who is meant to shoot him turns out to be a motivational speaker who tries to alter him , but he gets in over his head . The film was such a hit that it prompted Beatty to really race for president in 2000 .I wish I was joking . That is Bulworth in the video , with Bill Maher , who cant handle Beattys language .That was one fun scene , and I really need to re - enjoy the film again .

input: In the coming days, much of the coverage of the Chernobyl disaster in Russia is likely to focus on the 30-year anniversary and commemorations of it. The same may be said of reporting in Ukraine and Belarus, countries directly affected by the ramifications
continuation: of what happened . The first thing you need to realize about Chernobyl is that it is more of a sequence of connected events than a single moment in time .The atomic reactor in which it took place and the town it occurred near were part of a army - industrial compound which , previous to and since the disaster , has been governed over by a army - police - business coalition ( tripartism ) , effectively above the law , accountable to no person and not answerable for its actions . One of the first stories I ever covered for OCCRP was this report into the plight of those forced to move out of the Chernobyl zone and the tripartisms role in forcing many of them to be targeted and exploited for commercial gain .The survivors of Chernobyl have long since been denied essential services , decent conditions , and compensation by a system that puts

No official date exists to mark when valuable holdouts become critical to a team's hopes, but you can figure any player not signed by this weekend has become a major problem.
The two biggest holdouts of the season are Green Bay quarterback Don Maj
continuation: kowski and New England ' s defensive lineman William Henderson . The Packers officially have about a million dollar offer to Majkowski , who is one of three players who can still be compensated under the old salary cap .He ' ll getting a far better deal if he waits until after March 1 , but he ' ll be in limbo , making only the minimum of $ 110 , 000 if he doesn ' t sign soon . Both sides are showing they expect a agreement to be reached .Henderson isn ' t close to a deal , and if he doesn ' t sign by the weekend , the Patriots are heading to be in a huge bind . They only have about $ 1 . 7 million to spend under the cap , and only six players are under contract , so Henderson ' s 11 percent share of the salary cap comes at a critical time .Other teams have problems of their own .

continuation: Wu is a Qualcomm worker , its likely he worked on radio - related Qualcomm software . There is no information available at this time regarding the conditions of Wus death .

input: If you are willing to take the time to calculate the needed calories to bulk up, the process should be relatively simple. Bulking up or building muscle means getting a mass stimulus from resistance-training and then supplying your body with adequate

Airlift of a Marine Corps battalion to Lebanon demonstrated that deploying contingency forces from the continental United States to an overseas operation was feasible and expeditious.
During the Cold War, the United States deployed its Armed Forces to support the national objectives of various
continuation: allies and partners across the globe . The deployment of these forces was costly and the creation of bases overseas , while frequently essential , was less than attractive from a strategic perspective .Deployments , whether personnel or equipment , takes weeks , if not months , to plan and execute , as resources needed to be brought into theater to support units that would be deployed . The adoption of Marine Aircraft Group 14 ( MAG 14 ) , the Blue Devils , by the Marine Corps Air Station ( MCAS ) Cherry Point , North Carolina in the 1990s transformed the capabilities of the combat element , and the fast - pacing troops of the First Marine Expeditionary Force ( MEF ) began to expand its area of activities .The need to develop battle power beyond the usual two - war level dictated by 1980s - era force planning and

The fight against Ottawas proposed tax changes for small corporations isnt over, even after watered-down policies were proposed in the latest federal budget following months of business community backlash.
The Coalition for Small Business Tax Fairness, a
continuation: group of business organizations , says the introduced modifications would still harm the countrys small businesses . The organization says its not only about higher taxes but also decreasing the already - low corporate taxation rate .It says the changes will push business owners to pull money out of their companies and instead invest in other securities or personal properties . However , it welcomes the governments move to remove certain types of passive revenue from the proposals , as well as changes that restrict the using of revenue sprinkling , which sees earnings among family groups to escape taxation .Despite the changes , business owners continue question whether tax planning might remain a thing of the past for little companies .

Gunshots in a sanctuary of peace. C
continuation: ries for justice from victims families . And a surge of outrage and terror spreading from Americas neighborhoods to a divided Senate .The school shooting in Parkland , Florida , which murdered 17 people , has reignited a passionate discussion over how to keep this from happening again . In the immediate wake , victims and leaders , notably several Sikh Americans , expressed their opposition to arming educators .A few courageous legislators even dared to talk about the issue of background checks . The outrage , however , has become diluted .After only two weeks , it has become fewer about how to protect American children , and more about how to punish others in society . input: Red Hat bought IT automation-centric configuration management DevOps-friendly firm Ansible, okay so we know that part. Retaining the Ansible brand and names as it does, this month sees Red Hat launch Ansible Container, but what is
continuation: this , you may ask ? Indeed , Google held its own kind of developer summit recently , where it announced some fresh tools , amongst them Kubernetes , which is a rivals to Docker .Red Hat said that containers are revolutionizing application development and implementation . input: A new year means a new me. Long gone are the days of my subtle judgment on the current climate of the music industry. With the weather having gone from cold to unearthly, and Boston looking incredibly unfamiliar to a Texas native, so I

A quick run-through of basic measures of investment value for shares and stock markets.
The most widely used calculation, this ratio compares a companys value with its profits. To work it out, you take the share price and divide it
continuation: by the net profit after taxes . Profits are typically calculated in two ways : net profit or operating profit .The net profit is the end result of all accounting actions , including taxes and any regulations made . The operating profit is calculated after removing various costs and costs .The higher the ratio , the higher the value is put on a companys ability to earn profits . A measure of a companys efficiency at turning its capital into revenues .The ratio is calculated by separating the net profit after taxes by the book price of gross assets . The book price of assets gives how many it would cost the company to replace all its assets , as of the financial year ending .This does not necessarily reflect the present market price of these assets . Book value / Market value This ratio represents the relationship between a companys book price and its market price .It is calculated by dividing the book price of gross assets by the stock price . BANKS FAVORED week-long term deposits this week, resulting in a sustained decline in yields for these papers despite an uptrend seen for longer tenors.
Offers for Wednesdays auction reached P60.829 billion
continuation: , lower than last weeks P61 . 397 billion . The oversubscription rate was 0 . 39 times , which is a lot smaller than the previous auction held last week at 1 . 01 times .This shows a substantial drop in bank demand as a result of a significantly greater interest rates environment , said Global Securities chief of research Jose Paolo Dy . Offers at the auction for P60 billion allotted 1 . 5 weeks to 2 years were reduced to P34 billion from P44 . 617 billion last month .Bids on the four - month to six - month section remained at P26 . 829 billion . Demand from non - banking organizations was especially subdued for the longer tenors , which reveals us that the banks are run out of maturity for their established term deposit liabilities , Dy said .

input: PHILADELPHIA  Today, electrophysiologists from Penn Medicine implanted the regions first subcutaneous implantable cardioverter defibrillator (ICD) for sudden cardiac arrest, a potentially fatal electrical malfunction
continuation: of the heart that can cause death or left the heart totally damaged . The subcutaneous defibrillator using a pulse generator constructed to stand under the flesh and connect to the heart via electrodes inserted just below the flesh in the upper chest .In past decades , various such machines have been authorized for use , but were now the first to implant one in the region . The new implant allows for more patient comfort , greater procedure time and increased cosmetic outcomes , while reaching the same goal as standard devices to reduce sudden suicide due to hazardous heart rhythms , said Sandeep Sinha , MD , a Penn Medicine cardiologist and associate professor of Medicine in the Perelman School of Medicine .He added , Although these devices are typically indicated in those who have experienced rapid cardiac arrest or are at high danger for it , we anticipate that the subcutaneous ICD will appeal to more patients

continuation: round of the 2012 draft , while Morris - - a product of North Carolina ' s small college system - - joined the Washington Redskins in the sixth round . Researchers have developed a new compound that may soon be developed into an effective treatment for melanoma, the deadliest form of skin cancer.

Skin cancer is the most pervasive form of cancer in
continuation: the United States . It impacts roughly 3 . 5 million people each year .Approximately 100 , 000 instances of melanoma - the deadliest type of skin cancer - are diagnosed each season . The skin cancer originates in melanocytes - the cells that produce pigment - and spreads to other parts of the bodies through the lymphatic network .It can also spread via the bloodstream . In 2017 , more than 6 , 000 persons in the United States died from melanoma .Although the infection is fewer prevalent in Europe , an estimated 12 , 500 individuals will die from it each year there , too . continuation: . The dust devils were detected by Spirit ' s mast camera , which had been specially designed to manage the severe environment of Mars .The mast sensor takes panoramic images at 300 - nanometre resolution and has very high dynamic range , allowing it to take images of the sun and skies . The mast camera is sited near the rover ' s navigation cameras , so scientists are able to keep an eye on the terrain that they pass over .According to planetary scientist Tim Goudge , of the University of Arizona , Tucson , " it is possible that the dust devils in the photographs are related to what Spirit ' s wheels and rover tracks look like . input: If President Clinton wants to see how activist government can solve social problems with strong public support, he should take a few days to visit Canada. With Toronto's World Series victory, the nationwide referendum on constitutional reform (including the status of Quebec), and the
continuation: political firestorm over the Quebec referendum , there ' s been a plenty of talk about the inadequacies of the US system . At the same time , in a sign of how far matters have went in Canada , the Toronto Star editorialized against the referendum legislation because it infringed too much on civil liberties .The Canadian system has some things in its favor . The country is more homogeneous and wealthy than the US and has fewer sharp divisions .There are local and provincial differences , but in Canada they are far less sharp than in the US . Canada also has much more public participation .Some of the policy innovations - - equalization paid to poorer provinces , bilingual schooling in Quebec , army duty for aboriginal citizens - - were passed only because public opinion prompted the federal government to shift . For police recruits, the psychological evaluation process represents one of the last hurdles to getting hired. The
continuation: purpose of the psychological assessment is to identify problem behaviors , and making sure the candidate is a safe person who does not have a record of violent behavior . As Athens goes to the polls, has the British left fallen out of love with the EU?
In 1874, Karl Marx had an imaginary conversation with Mikhail Bakunin. Nowadays, they would just have had a Twitter spat, but back then
continuation: they were distinct and the terms of the debate were distinct . The gist of the debate concerned whether the Paris Commune was a purely phenomenal happening or a purely dialectical happening , and its ultimate import .To Marx , it was the former , a barricade of stones and mortar that would offer a transition to the Paris Commune of the future . To Bakunin , it was the latter : an instance of peoples struggles for emancipation from capitalism , a prototype of the revolution .Marx was willing to be proved wrong . It is this spirit of testing , challenging and pushing against the grain that is undoubtedly the most missed element of the debates within the Labour Party and wider left over Brexit .The form of the discourse has altered . continuation: volcanoes on Jupiter ' s moon Io , released by NASA ' s Galileo satellites this week , displays a volcanic terrain that is unique even among the hundreds of active volcanoes on that planet ' s four moons . Argentina labor's umbrella organization CGT, has organized a strike for Monday to protest the economic reforms being implemented y the administration of president Mauricio Macri's business friendly administration.
Tens of thousands of people have marched on Saturday in central
continuation: Buenos Aires to protest against the government ' s measures , which have been criticised for spelling the end of several state - supplied services . The recession has led many Argentines to protest in favor of a state - backed economic strategy that has saw a widening income gap and soaring poverty and inflation .Argentina ' s financial crisis came to deepen in late 2015 after a " macri bump " inflated an already overheated economy with capital inflows that had financed the nation ' s recovery from 2001 - 2002 crisis and financial crisis in 2008 . The E-notation means that you should multiply the constant by 10 raised to the power following the "E". Hence, 2.0E6 is two million, while 3.333E-1 is approximately one third.
Here 2.0
continuation: 0E - 12 equals 2 . 0 times 10 - 12 . input: A police chase that began in Norwalk early this morning ended in Des Moines as the man being chased jumped to his death from a parking ramp. Norwalk Police Chief Eddie Kuhl says it began with a call of a person who was possibly suicidal who
continuation: had stolen a 2013 Ford Fusion from Norwalk . Kuhl said the pursuit came through several counties with speeds of up to 100 miles an hour , and the car had no license plates .Kuhl said officers saw the man drove on Highway 218 in Warren County as he was attempting to steer to the right of a semi , but the man turned away . Authorities finally located the car on I - 80 in Warren County with a pursuit that led to the man drove into Des Moines and parking on the ramp at the intersection of I - 80 and I - 35 / 80 .The man ran from the car and climbed over the railing . Kuhl said the man tried to climb over the railing but dropped into the hole below .No one was hurt as the car was totaled as well as the semi .

When a South Carolina man found a Waffle House's only employee asleep, he decided to make the food himself.
Alex Bowen was returning from a night of drinking when he visited the restaurant to satisfy an early-morning food craving.
He waited
continuation: a few minutes to be sat , but since the diner was out of eggs , Bowen decided to cook a waffle himself , ABC News reported . Bowen sat in a booth and watched an worker , who ' s not being identified , sleeping at the restaurant .When the worker gotten up and left , Bowen decided to complete the meal himself . He put a donut , bacon and an egg on top of his waffle before smothering it all in syrup .When he sat down , the dish arrived . The strange instant was caught on camera and shared to Twitter .Bowen telling WJBF News the meal he made was " exceptionally wonderful . " " It was just a really great waffle , " Bowen said ." March 27 - A greater proportion of quota places for women is among the changes successfully proposed by the World Rowing Federation (FISA) to its qualification system ahead of Rio 2016.
The changes, which have now been approved by the International Olympic Committee
continuation: ( IOC ) , will coming into effect for the Olympic qualification rules for the Paris 2024 Games . Starting with a small rental development where youre adding one
continuation: to three homes to a property , its less risky than a greater development . A British Columbia engineering science professor has developed a high-resolution scanner that he says will revolutionize how eye diseases are diagnosed to prevent vision loss.
Prof. Marinko Sarunic of Simon Fraser University said doctors currently use low-resolution scanners that
continuation: can miss early changes in the retina . A bright line in the eye , known a lesion , is a classic indication of an early eye disease , he said , but scanners cannot catch up the tiny lesions that might lead to earlier vision failure .Sarunic stated his scanner should be able to diagnose lesions as small as 15 micrometers in width , whereas modern scanners recognize lesions as big as 150 micrometers . Dr . James Marsh of the University of Montreal Health Center said his scanner is at least 10 times faster than conventional ones and can even view tumours in the eye .He said that Sarunics machine will decrease the time and expense of eye scans .

input: Father of the Nation' is an honorific bestowed on individuals who are considered the most important in the process of the establishment of a country or a nation. They are instrumental in the birth of their nations by way of liberating them from colonial or other occupation
continuation: or by way of establishing an independent and sovereign nation - nation . The terms Father of the Nation or Mother of the Nation have become a part of popular political terminology and sometimes employed in Asia and Africa .They are often employed as patriotic rhetoric and modeled after Indian Nationalist Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi , the Father of the Nation , but is also associated with South Korean president Syngman Rhee and Israeli political president David Ben - Gurion . More generally , the term is often employed by states as a patriotic term of honor and is modeled after Soviet president Joseph Stalin .It is also used to commemorate nationalist communist leaders who are regarded as " founding fathers " of the state . Most nations have a specific " Father of the Nation " or " Mother of the Nation " .This page contains text from Wikipedia, the Free Encyclopedia - https://wn.com/F

input: A classic British memoir gets the full costume drama treatment with this beautifully crafted World War I drama, although it never quite transcends the "beloved book" tone, remaining so worthy that it only rarely springs to life. The acting is sharp, as
continuation: are the costumes and setting , and there ' s a vivid story and riveting storyline that effectively depicts the early portion of the wartime and some of the main characters who living through it . But by the end , the filmmakers struggle to make something more out of the narrative .Based on the 1932 autobiography by Canadian Mary Borden , the film recounts how her initiatives to bring German soldiers from World War I as hostages of war back to England helped alter the war ' s outcome and became a major cause in the early 20th century . Its messages might be melodramatic but they ' re also important and moving , and the portrait of the women in the Allied battle effort is a treasure .It ' s a shame that it rarely quite comes to life in the manner that its beautiful and passionate aspects promise . input:
Security always comes down to securing applications.
The whole point of firewalls is to hide internally deployed network applicationsassumed to have exploitable vulnerabilities somewherefrom the outside world.
The main weakness of firewalls is that they are
continuation: focused on safety , which isnt precisely the same thing as a consumer experience : That is , how firewalls behave when it comes to performance and availability . So , firewall regulations are ( a ) hard to configure and manage and ( b ) for sure can negatively affect application availability and performance .Again , that doesnt mean all firewalls are bad . Just not as great as they could be .Then there are proxies . Proxies are programs that route and filter traffic between the Internet and private systems .And while theyre not new , proxies are growing increasingly essential to the enterprise . One of the most important reasons is that they enable secure entry to applications .So , as far as enhancing application quality and availability , proxies are essential . A good example of this is the Secure Web Gateway ( SWG ) .But truly , its all about the protection .

How David Bowie helped my autistic son become himself.
When my son Benj was a small boy of 4 and 5 with virtually no original language and no ability or desire to play in conventional ways, he and I connected through music. I
continuation: d find him at his desk , poring over the contents of cassette cases Id brought home from the radio stations where I worked . Hed pick out the cassette he desired , and sit in his high chair listening to the tiny , crackly speakers that played my song .He knew the collection by heart ; at times hed even told me what to play next before I could find the case . He also knowing what to do when a song concluded .Without fail , after every tune hed clamber up onto my shoulder and reach up to pat the side of my face . I was not certain how to explain this to other families .I begun to reference it in passing , wanting to gauge the response of parents of other tiny students . The most popular teething rings contain hormone-disrupting chemicals, a new study warns.
Endocrine-disrupting chemicals are banned from use in products for children.
However, no studies have ever tested plastic teethers for
continuation: the presence of substances that disrupt hormones , experts at Tel Aviv University said . The survey measured for 18 different phthalates in a range of popular teething toys .The results showed 14 had amounts that were either above or just below the highest limit set by requirements . Endocrine - disrupting compounds ( EDCs ) are present in a variety of common products , particularly teething toys .While research demonstrate that these toys can prevent babies from chewing on objects and toys , they may increase their danger of exposure to EDCs . continuation: expand diagnostic facilities , yet still meet stringent standards of cost containment . An operation in a specialised unit at Oldham General Hospital removed eggs from Louises mother , Jean Brown , and fertilised them with sperm from her husband John .The resulting embryo was then moved to her mothers uterus , where it implanted and her mums life as a mother had begun . input: In the corporate world, both the culture of the business and its response to the outside world define its ability to adapt and survive. This includes attitude to risk and innovation, approach to corporate social responsibility, team building, diversity and inclusion policies and its bribery
continuation: and corruption . Over the previous two decades , I have been privy to some of the best and worst of business behaviour .Having witnessed some of the most terrible failings of people and structures , Im now exploring the reasons that managers fail to grasp the potential benefits of involving workers in decision making . I have discovered that what requires to be understood is the emphasis on maintaining the status quo within organisations and the opposition to reform that usually hinders progress .The first step is to comprehend the reason why this arises . In The Fear Factor , Adam Galinsky explains that leaders who oppose creativity are particularly sensitive to any losses , particularly when they threaten their spot at the top .They will attempt to block any new concepts that might lead in them losing control . This often results to innovation being impeded or stifled as it can directly influence the perceived control and power of a leader

continuation: list applications are available on the web and as wireless applications than any other kind of software . If Im clear about what my next action step is , it becomes much easier to complete that act .This is why a to - do list application is so powerful . You know the phrase , a picture is worth a thousand words ?Well , I believe that the same is true for to - do lists . The more precise and visual a list is , the more likely it is that you will complete the objectives .Visuals communicate more information than lists of words .
